âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Fully portable C (C++ compatible) library with no external dependencies â€¢ Compilable to any MCU or MPU, with any (RT)OS â€¢ Supports monochrome, ePaper, OLED or TFT displays â€¢ Distributed under the MIT license â€¢ Requires only 32kB RAM and 128 kB Flash, a frame buffer, and at least an 1/10 screen sized buffer for rendering
ðŸ“– Summary: LVGL is a free and open-source embedded graphics library for creating UIs. It supports a wide range of hardware and features, including various displays, input devices, and advanced rendering capabilities. The library is highly portable and suitable for resource-constrained devices.
